content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Nov 2018Is the Keppel KBS REIT considered a US REIT? If so, what are the taxes imposed?1 answerAnswerBump0

Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 07 Nov 2018You just have to file up the W-8ben form for tax exemption. Otherwise a withholding tax of 30% will be imposed.Just refer to the Keppel KBS reit website for info.http://www.kepkbsusreit.com/en/content.aspx?sid=74240 comments0
